item.title: [Award] National third award on 2019 China Collegiate Computing Contest (Top 2.5%)
item.description: This contest is held by Tsinghua University, Nankai University and Bytes Bounce Company, Inc to all students over the great China area.

item.title: [Project] Hierachical Attention for Speech Emotion Recognition
item.description: Using hierarchical attention mechanisms at the level of sentences and words to improve the accuracy of speech emotion recognition. This project is supported by National Natural Science Foundation.
